tool.name: ScriptManager: Two-color Heatmap
tool.description: Generate heat map using CDT/tabular files.
tool.command:
java -jar $__tool_directory__/@JAR_FILENAME@ figure-generation heatmap 'pileup_sense.cdt' -o '$output' #if str($figure_options.figure) == "define" : -x '$figure_options.pixel_width' -y '$figure_options.pixel_height' -a '$figure_options.abs_threshold' -p '$figure_options.percent_threshold'
#if str($color_options.color_type) == "color_select" : -c '$color_options.color_type.color_select_value' #end if #if str($color_options.color_type.custom_hex) == "custom_hex" : -c '$color_options.color_type.custom_hex_value' #end if #else: -c '0000FF' #end if '$input'

param.name: abs_threshold
param.label: use the specified value for contrast thresholding

param.name: percent_threshold
param.label: use the specified percenttile for contrast thresholding

tool.help:
**What it does**
Generate a heatmap from a tab-delimited matrix file.
http://pughlab.mbg.cornell.edu/scriptmanager-docs/docs/Tools/figure-generation/heatmap
